patient_id: Unique anonymous/de-identified ID for the patient from the provider.
history: Cancer relevant comorbidity or eviromental exposure.
ethnicity: Patient Ethnic group. Can be derived from self-assement or genetic analysis.
ethnicity_assessment_method: Patient Ethnic group assessment method. Leave blank if ethnicity was not collected/provided
initial_diagnosis: Diagnosis of the patient when first diagnosed at age_at_initial_diagnosis - this can be different than the diagnosis at the time of collection which is collected in the sample section. No acronyms.
age_at_initial_diagnosis: This is the age of first diagnostic. Can be prior to the age at which the tissue sample was collected for PDX implant.

ethnicity: Use NCIT term where possible. Ctrl-Click here to see terms.
initial_diagnosis: Use NCIT term when possible. Ctrl-Click here to see terms
age_at_initial_diagnosis: Numerical. Can be exact age or binned in 10 year groups (1-9, 10-19, ...)
